default.$description: Default stroke color to define shape and provide essential detail.
Default stroke width to define shape and provide essential detail.
Default fill color for an element where specific meaning or emphasis is not required.

neutral.$description: Used as a fill to convey a concept which is neither positive or negative.

success.$description: Used as a fill to convey a success or active concept, has a positive connotation.

warning.$description: Used as a fill to convey a caution or warning concept, has a slightly negative connotation.

danger.$description: Used as a fill to convey a critical or danger concept, has a negative connotation.

orange.$description: Used for orange accent stroke detail on an object or attention-drawing element.

teal.$description: Used for teal accent stroke detail on an object or attention-drawing element.

strong.$description: Used for dark accent stroke detail on an object or attention-drawing element.

subtle.$description: Used to add depth to a secondary element and supporting surface.

strong.$description: Used for an element requiring visual emphasis without competing with primary content or status indicators.

orange.$description: Used to add orange to a secondary element and supporting surface.

teal.$description: Used to add teal to a secondary element and supporting surface.

color.$description: Used for the consistent background shape present across all illustrations. Provides a unified foundation that visually grounds each illustration while maintaining system cohesion.

hover.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the active state.

disabled.$description: Used for the icon color of a disabled toggle switch.

focus.$description: Used for the background color of a token in a token-selector when it's token-container is in the focus state.

color.$description: Used for the token foreground color.
Used for the token background color.
